name: Take Care of the Frog
description:
Don't let your frog die.... It's pretty simple.

The game is meant to be played over time.

HOW TO PLAY:

You lose 1 hunger every hour

Having your hunger go below 0 makes your frog die

You can play the game if you have more than 0 hearts

Playing the game gives you coins

coins can buy things

You get 1 time every hour

GET 2400 TIME TO WIN
